query: I’m looking for papers published in 2017 that are related to the following sentence: Training of neural machine translation (MNT) models usually uses mini-batches for efficiency purposes. Give only the papers co-authored by Makoto Morishita.

keywords.Semantic Query: Training of neural machine translation (NMT) models usually uses mini-batches for efficiency purposes.

ground_truth_papers: An Empirical Study of Mini-Batch Creation Strategies for Neural Machine Translation.
